public void bfs(int s, int t) {
  if (s == t) return;
  boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
  visited[s]=true;
  Queue<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
  queue.add(s);
  int[] prev = new int[v];
  for (int i = 0; i < v; ++i) {
    prev[i] = -1;
  }
  while (queue.size() != 0) {
    int w = queue.poll();
   for (int i = 0; i < adj[w].size(); ++i) {
      int q = adj[w].get(i);
      if (!visited[q]) {
        prev[q] = w;
        if (q == t) {
          print(prev, s, t);
          return;
        }
        visited[q] = true;
        queue.add(q);
      }
    }
  }
}

private void print(int[] prev, int s, int t) { // é€’å½’æ‰“å°s->tçš„è·¯å¾„
  if (prev[t] != -1 && t != s) {
    print(prev, s, prev[t]);
  }
  System.out.print(t + " ");
}

boolean found = false; // å…¨å±€å˜é‡æˆ–è€…ç±»æˆå‘˜å˜é‡

public void dfs(int s, int t) {
  found = false;
  boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
  int[] prev = new int[v];
  for (int i = 0; i < v; ++i) {
    prev[i] = -1;
  }
  recurDfs(s, t, visited, prev);
  print(prev, s, t);
}

private void recurDfs(int w, int t, boolean[] visited, int[] prev) {
  if (found == true) return;
  visited[w] = true;
  if (w == t) {
    found = true;
    return;
  }
  for (int i = 0; i < adj[w].size(); ++i) {
    int q = adj[w].get(i);
    if (!visited[q]) {
      prev[q] = w;
      recurDfs(q, t, visited, prev);
    }
  }
}

/**
* æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†
*
* @param start è·¯å¾„æŸ¥æ‰¾èµ·å§‹ç‚¹
* @param end è·¯å¾„æŸ¥æ‰¾ç»ˆç‚¹
*/
public void depthFirstSearch(int start, int end) {
if (start == end) {
return;
}
// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªvisitedæ•°ç»„ï¼Œä¿å­˜æ˜¯å¦è®¿é—®è¿‡
boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ ˆï¼Œä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªåè¿›å…ˆå‡ºæ ˆï¼Œä¿å­˜å·²è®¿é—®ï¼Œä½†ç›¸è¿èŠ‚ç‚¹æœªè®¿é—®çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
Stack<Integer> stack = new Stack<Integer>();
// å…ˆå°†startå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­
visited[start] = true;
stack.push(start);
while (!stack.isEmpty()) {
// å–å‡ºï¼Œä½†ä¸å‡ºæ ˆ
int step = stack.peek();
// æ ‡è¯†ä½ï¼Œæ ‡è¯†stepèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸‹çš„é‚»æ¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æœªèµ°è¿‡çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
boolean hasNoVisited = false;
for (int i = 0; i < adj[step].size(); i++) {
int nextStep = adj[step].get(i);
// å­˜åœ¨æœªèµ°è¿‡èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ™flag = true,å°†nextStepå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­ï¼Œç»§ç»­å‰è¡Œ
if (visited[nextStep] == false) {
hasNoVisited = true;
visited[nextStep] = true;
stack.push(nextStep);
if (nextStep == end) {
return;
}
break;
}
}
// é‚»æ¥çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ˜¯å·²èµ°è¿‡çš„ï¼Œåˆ™å‡ºæ ˆ
if (hasNoVisited == false) {
stack.pop();
}
}
// éå†è¾“å‡ºæ ˆä¸­å­˜å‚¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå³è·¯å¾„
if (!stack.isEmpty()) {
Iterator<Integer> it = stack.iterator();
while (it.hasNext()) {
System.out.print(it.next() + " ");
}
}
}

/**
* å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢
* @param s èµ·å§‹é¡¶ç‚¹
* @return
*/
public List<Integer> threeDegreeRelationBfs(int s) {
boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
visited[s] = true;
Queue<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
queue.add(s);
List<Integer> result = new ArrayList<>();
// è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹åˆ°èµ·å§‹é¡¶ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»
int[] degree = new int[v];
// è®°å½•æ€»å…±éå†çš„æ¬¡æ•°
int cycleNum = 0;
// å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ï¼Œéå†æ•´å¼ å›¾
while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
Integer w = queue.poll();
// é¡¶ç‚¹ç¦»èµ·å§‹é¡¶ç‚¹è·ç¦»è¶…è¿‡ 3 æ—¶åˆ™é€€å‡º
if (degree[w] == 3) {
continue;
}
// éå†å…¶å…³æ³¨çš„é¡¶ç‚¹
for (Integer q : adj[w]) {
// æ²¡æœ‰è®¿é—®è¿‡çš„é¡¶ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œè®°å½•
if (!visited[q]) {
visited[q] = true;
// æ·»åŠ åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—
queue.add(q);
// è®°å½•å½“å‰é¡¶ç‚¹åˆ°èµ·å§‹é¡¶ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»ï¼ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾å…¶å‰é©±é¡¶ç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»
degree[q] = degree[w] + 1;
cycleNum++;
// è®°å½•ç»“æœ
result.add(q);
}
}
}
System.out.println("å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ä¸‰åº¦å¥½å‹å…³ç³»ä¸€å…±éå†çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼š" + cycleNum);
return result;
}

/**
* æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢
* <p>
*
* @param s èµ·å§‹é¡¶ç‚¹
*/
public List<Integer> threeDegreeRelationDfs(int s) {
// é‡‡ç”¨å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ç®—æ³•
boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
visited[s] = true;
List<Integer> relations = new ArrayList<>();
// é€’å½’å¯»æ‰¾é¡¶ç‚¹çš„å…³ç³»
int cycleNum = findDegreeRelation(visited, relations, s, 0);
System.out.println("æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ä¸‰åº¦å¥½å‹å…³ç³»ä¸€å…±éå†çš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼š" + cycleNum);
return relations;
}

/**
* é€’å½’å¯»æ‰¾é¡¶ç‚¹å…³ç³»â€”â€”æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢
*
* @param visited
* @param relations
* @param p
* @param level
* @return
*/
private int findDegreeRelation(boolean[] visited, List<Integer> relations, Integer p, int level) {
if (level == 3) {
return 1;
}
int cycleNum = 0;
for (int h = 0; h < adj[p].size(); h++) {
Integer t = adj[p].get(h);
if (!visited[t]) {
relations.add(t);
visited[p] = true;
cycleNum += findDegreeRelation(visited, relations, t, level + 1);
}
cycleNum++;
}
return cycleNum;
}

/**
* dfs æœç´¢åˆ°çš„è·¯å¾„ä¸ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„
*/
public void dfs(int s, int t) {
final AtomicReference<Boolean> found = new AtomicReference<>(false);

boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
Arrays.fill(visited, false);

int[] prev = new int[v];
Arrays.fill(prev, -1);

recurDfs(found, visited, prev, s, t);
print(prev, t);
}

private void recurDfs(AtomicReference<Boolean> found, boolean[] visited, int[] prev, int s, int t) {
if (visited[s] || found.get()) {
return;
}
if (s == t) {
found.set(true);
return;
}
visited[s] = true;
for (Integer i : adj[s]) {
prev[i] = s;
recurDfs(found, visited, prev, i, t);
}
}

/**

*
* @param s s
*/
public static void findThreeDegreeFriendship(int s, Graph graph) {
int v = graph.v;
LinkedList<Integer>[] adj = graph.adj;

// è®°å½•å·²ç»è¢«è®¿é—®è¿‡çš„é¡¶ç‚¹ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤è®¿é—®
boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
visited[s]=true;

// é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œç”¨äºé©±åŠ¨ä»é¡¶ç‚¹å¾€å¤–å±‚ä¸€å±‚å±‚çš„éå†
Queue<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
queue.add(s);

int level = 0;
while (queue.size() != 0) {
if (level > 3) {
break;
}

// é˜Ÿåˆ—å®½åº¦ï¼Œä¾æ®è¿™ä¸ªé˜Ÿåˆ—å®½åº¦æ¥åŒºåˆ†å±‚çº§
int width = queue.size();

for (int i = 0; i < width; ++i) {
int w = queue.poll();
if (level > 0) {
System.out.println(w);
}
for (int j = 0; j < adj[w].size(); ++j) {
int q = adj[w].get(j);
if (!visited[q]) {
visited[q] = true;
queue.add(q);
}
}
}

level++;
}

}

private void search(E start, E end, List<E> visitedArr, List<Node<E>> pathList) {
if (found) return;
visitedArr.add(start);
if (Objects.equals(start, end)) {
found = true;
return;
}
int j = getIndexFromEle(start);
Set<E> nodes = arr.get(j).keySet();
if (nodes.size() > 0) {
for (E node : nodes) {
if (!visitedArr.contains(node)) {
pathList.add(new Node<>(start, node));
search(node, end, visitedArr, pathList);
if (found) break;
}
}
}
}

private void searchInStack(E start, E end, List<E> visitedArr, List<Node<E>> pathList, Stack<E> stack) {
if (found) return;
stack.push(start);
E prev = start;
while (!stack.isEmpty()) {
E top = stack.pop();
visitedArr.add(top);
if (!Objects.equals(prev, top)) pathList.add(new Node<>(prev, top));
if (Objects.equals(top, end)) {
found = true;
return;
}
int j = getIndexFromEle(top);
Set<E> nodes = arr.get(j).keySet();
if (nodes.size() > 0) {
for (E node : nodes) {
if (!visitedArr.contains(node)) {
stack.push(node);
prev = top;
}
}
}
}
}

class Graph {

void addEdge(int s, int t) {
adj[s].add(t);

void bfs(int s, int t) {
if (s == t) return;

//å·²ç»è®¿é—®å®šç‚¹
boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];

LinkedList<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
queue.add(s);

for (int i = 0; i < prev.length; i++) {
prev[i] = -1;
}

private boolean found = false;


void dfs(int s, int t) {
found = false;

boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];

int[] prev = new int[v];

reduceDfs(s, t, visited, prev);
printR(prev, s, t);
}

private void reduceDfs(int s, int t, boolean[] visited, int[] prev) {
if (s == t) {
found = true;
return;
}

for (Integer q : adj[s]) {
if (found) break;
if (visited[q]) continue;

visited[q] = true;
prev[q] = s;
reduceDfs(q, t, visited, prev);
}
}



private void printR(int[] prev, int s, int t) {
if (prev[t] != -1 && t != s) {
printR(prev, s, prev[t]);
}

System.out.format("%d\t", t);
}
}

public void bfs(int s, int t) {
if (s == t) return;
boolean[] visited = new boolean[v];
visited[s]=true;
Queue<Integer> queue = new LinkedList<>();
queue.add(s);
int[] prev = new int[v];
for (int i = 0; i < v; ++i) {
prev[i] = -1;
}
while (queue.size() != 0) {
int w = queue.poll();
for (int i = 0; i < adj[w].size(); ++i) {
int q = adj[w].get(i);
if (!visited[q]) {
prev[q] = w;
if (q == t) {
print(prev, s, t);
return;
}
visited[q] = true;
queue.add(q);
}
}
}
}

private void print(int[] prev, int s, int t) { // é€’å½’æ‰“å° s->t çš„è·¯å¾„
if (prev[t] != -1 && t != s) {
print(prev, s, prev[t]);
}
System.out.print(t + " ");
}

private static void recursionDfs(int w, int t, boolean[] visited, int[] prev, result result, LinkedList<Integer>[] adj) {
if (result.isFound) return;

for (int i = 0; i < adj[w].size(); i++) {
Integer q = adj[w].get(i);
if (!visited[q]) {
prev[q] = w;
visited[q] = true;
if (w == t) result.isFound = true;
recursionDfs(q, t, visited, prev, result, adj);
}
}
}
